message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $15,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer, but $15,000 is too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $6,000 for the product.
Bob, thanks for your interest.  While $15,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $11,000. I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
Thanks for coming down on the price Alice.  I'm still a little ways off though. Would you consider $7,000?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. How about we split the difference and settle at $9,000? This is my final offer.
